mapper.select: select t1.id , t1.fk_report_id , t1.original , t1.organization , t1.docket_no , t1.reconsideration_flag , t1.reconsideration , t1.punishment_content , t1.punishment_amount , t1.punishment_effective , t1.punishment_deadline , t1.isfail , t1.create_time , t1.modify_time , t1.validate_state , t1.create_by , t1.update_by from ext_wl_sh_sr_punishments t1 where t1.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update ext_wl_sh_sr_punishments t1 set t1.fk_report_id =#{dto.fkReportId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, t1.original =#{dto.original,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.organization =#{dto.organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.docket_no =#{dto.docketNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.reconsideration_flag =#{dto.reconsiderationFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.reconsideration =#{dto.reconsideration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.punishment_content =#{dto.punishmentContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.punishment_amount =#{dto.punishmentAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.punishment_effective =#{dto.punishmentEffective,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.punishment_deadline =#{dto.punishmentDeadline,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.isfail =#{dto.isfail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.create_time =#{dto.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, t1.modify_time =#{dto.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, t1.validate_state ='1', t1.create_by =#{dto.createBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, t1.update_by =#{dto.updateBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where t1.id = #{dto.id}
mapper.delete: delete from ext_wl_sh_sr_punishments t1 where t1.ID in (${ids} )
mapper.update: update ext_wl_sh_sr_punishments t1 set t1.validate_state='0' where t1.id in( ${ids})
